subject: Project status update required
body: Hi team, please send me the updated project status report by Friday EOD. Make sure to highlight pending risks and blockers.

subject: Interview schedule confirmation
body: Dear candidate, kindly confirm whether you are available for the interview slot on Wednesday at 3 PM.

subject: This week in AI & cybersecurity
body: Welcome to your weekly digest! Here's what's happening in AI, ML, and cybersecurity across the globe.

subject: Server CPU usage exceeded threshold
body: Warning: CPU usage on server-23 has crossed 90%. Immediate investigation is recommended.

subject: Action items from yesterday's meeting
body: Here are the action items: 1) Prepare compliance audit checklist. 2) Update the vendor security assessment sheet. 3) Finalize onboarding plan for new team members.

subject: Reimbursement documents pending
body: Your reimbursement for the January expenses is pending due to missing receipts. Kindly upload them by Thursday.

subject: Password expiry notice
body: Your password will expire in 3 days. Please reset it using the company portal to avoid any login issues.

subject: Mandatory cybersecurity awareness training
body: You are required to complete the cybersecurity training module by this weekend. The training link has been shared earlier.

subject: Congratulations! You won a free iPhone!
body: Click this suspicious link to claim your free iPhone! Offer valid only for the next 2 minutes!

subject: Biggest sale of the year — flat 60% off
body: Dear customer, our annual mega sale is now live! Grab electronics, clothing, and accessories at unbelievable prices.

subject: Laptop upgrade request approved
body: Your request for laptop upgrade has been approved. Please visit the IT desk tomorrow between 10 AM – 1 PM to collect your new device.

subject: Town hall meeting on Monday
body: The CEO will be hosting the monthly town hall meeting next Monday at 11 AM. Attendance is mandatory for all employees.

subject: Annual team outing – RSVP required
body: We are planning our annual team outing for next month. Please RSVP by filling the linked form before Friday.

subject: Urgent: Policy document review pending
body: Please review the updated data protection policy and submit your acknowledgment before the deadline.

subject: Need your input on the report
body: Can you share your comments on the draft report? I need to finalize it by afternoon.

subject: Your monthly statement is ready
body: Your bank account statement for January is now available. Login to your portal to download it securely.

subject: New login detected
body: A new login to your GitHub account was detected from a Windows device. If this wasn’t you, please secure your account immediately.

subject: Assignment submission deadline extended
body: The deadline for your assignment submission has been extended to next Tuesday due to technical issues on the portal.

subject: Please share access to drive folder
body: Can you grant me access to the shared drive folder for the design documents? I need to upload updated diagrams.

subject: Employee wellness survey
body: We request you to participate in the quarterly wellness survey. Your feedback helps us improve employee initiatives.
